It was alright.  The seats against the wall are super uncomfortable - its like sitting on a piece of wood.  My benedict was lame - no tang to the hollandaise (more lemon?).  The huevos rancheros were better - beans, good salsa, and lots of cheese.  Cafe con leche was good but its good pretty much anywhere in Barcelona.  Would have been nice to sit in a sunny spot by the windows but there is just one huge table in that area where you'd be sitting 4 feet away from the person on the other side.  Most of us were crammed into one row with the crappy wall seats.  A good hollandaise would have changed my outlook but...
